Package marketplace.Handlers

Class OrganisationHandler

java.lang.Object
marketplace.Handlers.OrganisationHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class OrganisationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Handler class for Organisation object type. Handles main methods for interacting with Organisation type. Interacts with ORGANISATIONAL_UNIT_INFORMATION table in database.
See Also:
Organisation, Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    OrganisationHandler​(Client client)
    Constructor for each OrganisationHandler, just creates an instance and sets the client connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • OrganisationHandler

      public OrganisationHandler​(Client client)
      Constructor for each OrganisationHandler, just creates an instance and sets the client connection.
      Parameters:
      client - sets the connection to the server so that queries for the database can be sent.

  • Method Details

    • getAllOrganisations

      public java.util.List<Organisation> getAllOrganisations() throws java.lang.Exception
      Sends a query to the server to then get all the organisations from the database, ORGANISATIONAL_UNIT_INFORMATION table.
      Returns:
      a list of all organisations in the database, returns an empty list if no organisations are found.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when an error occurs in the process and returns an error message.

    • getOrganisation

      public Organisation getOrganisation​(java.lang.String orgID) throws java.lang.Exception
      Sends a query to the server to then get an organisation using their orgID.
      Parameters:
      orgID - is the orgID of the organisation being looked for.
      Returns:
      the organisation with that orgID, and throw exceptions if it can't be found.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when an error occurs in the process and returns an error message.
      java.lang.Exception - when the orgID can't be found in the database.

    • addOrganisation

      public void addOrganisation​(java.lang.String orgID, java.lang.String orgName, double credits) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates a new organisation in the ORGANISATIONAL_UNIT_INFORMATION table in the database if all values are valid.
      Parameters:
      orgID - is the orgID of the organisation being looked for.
      orgName - is the name of the organisation, unique to each organisation.
      credits - is the amount of credits the users in the organisation have to spend on assets in the market.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when an error occurs in the process and returns an error message.
      java.lang.Exception - when the orgName is too short or too long.
      java.lang.Exception - when the credits value is too large.
      java.lang.Exception - when the organisationName already exists in the database.

    • newOrganisationID

      public java.lang.String newOrganisationID()

    • getAllOrganisationsNames

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllOrganisationsNames()
      Searches through all the organisation's to get each orgName and returns it in a list of strings.
      Returns:
      a lsit of strings with all organisation names in it.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when an error occurs in the database process and returns an error message.

    • getOrganisationID

      public java.lang.String getOrganisationID​(java.lang.String organisationName) throws java.lang.Exception
      Searches for an organisation with the given orgName and returns that organisations orgID.
      Parameters:
      organisationName - the orgName of the organisation who's ID is to be searched for.
      Returns:
      the orgID of the organisation with the orgName provided.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when an error occurs in the database process or the organisation can't be found.

    • organisationHasCredits

      public boolean organisationHasCredits​(java.lang.String orgID, java.math.BigDecimal totalPrice) throws java.lang.Exception
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • updateOrganisationCredits

      public void updateOrganisationCredits​(java.lang.String orgID, java.math.BigDecimal credits) throws java.lang.Exception
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • getOrganisationTotalOwing

      public java.math.BigDecimal getOrganisationTotalOwing​(java.lang.String orgID) throws java.lang.Exception
      Get the total amount of credits that an organisation owes in active buy orders. So an overdraft can't occur.
      Parameters:
      orgID - for finding the organisation to check their active buy orders and to update their values.
      Returns:
      the bigdecmial of the organisation's current active buy order's credit amount.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when an error occurs in the database process or the organisation can't be found.

    • getOrganisationSellingQuantity

      public int getOrganisationSellingQuantity​(java.lang.String orgID, java.lang.String assetID) throws java.lang.Exception
      Get the total amount of an asset that an organisation is selling. So an overdraft can't occur in Inventory table.
      Parameters:
      orgID - for finding the organisation to check their active buy orders and to update their values.
      assetID - is the identifier of the asset being checked for quantity.
      Returns:
      the int quantity of that asset that an organisation has in active sell orders.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when an error occurs in the database process or the organisation can't be found.
